Title: Twitches
Writer: Melissa Gould (teleplay), Dan Berendsen (teleplay), H.B. Gilmour (book), Randi Reisfeld (book)
Actors: Tia Mowry-Hardrict, Tamera Mowry-Housley, Kristen Wilson, Patrick Fabian
Plot: Two teen witches who were separated at birth and were adopted by two different families meet on their 21st birthday and must use their powers to save the world in which they were born, where their birth mother still lives.
